markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stone Bullet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=168)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 560 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,300 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** [sling bullet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=82)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This sling bullet looks like a petrified serpent’s eye. A creature hit by an activated _stone bullet_ is subject to the effects of a 6th-level [_flesh to stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=123) spell (DC 34). 

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of _flesh to stone_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Stone Bullet
